title: Botters

embed.description: See the Summoner Level High Scores!

body: Ok some kid is already lvl 140 and hes playing non stop and only playing against twisted tree line bots and finishes the game within 7 min ???

replies.body:
Pretty sure someone looked into this when he was lv 70 and found that there were 8 hour breaks of no games, which would be when he sleeps. The other thing is buying a stupid amount of boosts.

Of course, it is pretty suspicious that someone has literally no life for multiple weeks.
Seems like a good way to unlock all the champs.  Might have to try this out.
depends on how much xp you get for each game. i mean SR vs bots it's between 150 and 200 xp and that overcharge map gets you around 100, sometimes less

Then he likes plays against TT bots and likes to finish within 7 mins.

Your point?
hes playing non stop he is obv botting
i thought lv 100 is max lol
there is no cap on levels.
